__e: Well, we talked about it last night, and I think I have got him convinced to give up his place and come live with us.
This is not about our relationship. This is about asking you to give up everything again, and I'm not gonna do it.
I can't ask him to give it all up and move here just for me.
It's the same with giving up my hopes, with women that had to give up hopes.
You believe that the loss of your will is too great a sacrifice.
But giving up your magic is not the answer.
